amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the EPA from using any funds appropriated in the bill to allow the importation into the U.S. of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) waste for disposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the EPA from using any funds appropriated in the bill to permit the importation into the U.S. of PolychlorinatedBiphenyls (PCBs) waste for disposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bentsen amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
